introGuide: Please fill all the required information and follow displayed patterns.

location.label: Where and when?
location.title: Chose the date and location of the concert.

errorMessages.invalid: Please check your name again for unwanted additional spaces.
Please check your name again for unwanted additional spaces.

cardName.label: Name on your card?
cardName.title: Enter the name displayed on your payment card.

errorMessages.required: Must enter your name on the credit/debit card.
errorMessages.invalid: Name is either too long or too short or has too many spaces.
Please check your email again for unwanted additional spaces.
Please enter 16 numbers displayed on your credit card in the following format: 0000 0000 0000 0000.

cardCvv.label: Your card security code?
cardCvv.title: Enter 3 digit number displayed on the back of your card. Avoid entering spaces.

errorMessages.required: Must enter 3 digit number displayed on the back of your card.
errorMessages.invalid: Please enter 3 digit number displayed on the back of your credit/debit card and avoid entering additional spaces.

cardExpiryDate.label: card expiry date?
cardExpiryDate.title: Choose expiry date displayed on your payment card.

errorMessages.required: Must choose expiry date displayed on your payment card.

street.label: street
street.title: Enter street name followed by a number

errorMessages.invalid: Please enter a street name followed by a nubmer.

errorMessages.required: If you do not have a post code, enter: 00000

date.label: Pick up an available date.
date.title: What date would you like your gig to take place

errorMessages.required: Pickup a date even if you are not sure and let us now in the "tell us more section."

gigType.label: What type of gig are you planning?
gigType.title: Choose gig type.

errorMessages.required: Please choose the type of your gig.

moreInfo.label: Want to tell us more about your gig?
moreInfo.title: Tell us more about your gig.
moreInfo.placeholder: Do you want us to be naked? Do you want us to wear smurf costumes? Any special requests?

errorMessages.invalid: You have reached maximum of 2000 characters.

checkbox.formChecked: I have checked all the entered information before submitting this form.
checkbox.termsConfirmed: Please check to agree to terms & conditions.
